info.title: Rate Table (A2X)
info.description:
You use this API to do the following:
* Create and copy rate tables
* Update rate tables, such as modify the scales, rates, and unreleased validity periods
* Release validity periods so that it can be used for charge calculation
* Delete rate tables that with unreleased validity periods

x-sap-shortText: Create, retrieve, update, and delete rate tables using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Stock Transport Order-Based Transportation Consolidation(5XC)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/5XC " Link To BP ")

[Manual Transportation Planning for Ocean Freight - Inbound(64B)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/64B " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
